required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PROtecting Ovaries and Fertility During Chemotherapy - The PROOF Trial
clinical_study.official_title: PROtecting Ovaries and Fertility During Chemotherapy - The PROOF Trial: A Randomized Controlled Trial of Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone Agonist (GnRHa) for Fertility Preservation in Oncology Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether gonadotropin releasing hormone agonists (medical therapy) will protect against ovarian failure in reproductive aged women undergoing sterilizing chemotherapy.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sonographic (biophysical) and biochemical markers of ovarian reserve
